alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 4:06PM EDT until April 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... South central Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 406 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Cairo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Thomasville, Havana, Cairo, Tallahassee, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Whigham, Attapulgus, Barwick, Climax, Alma, Dillon, Everett, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee and Iamonia. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
